name: One Fifth
description: The margins are closing in. Will you kill 49 to save one extra person?

options.name: Human-Dense Track
options.description: Fifty humans are tied down on the route of the oncoming trolley.

options.name: Slightly Less Dense Track
options.description: Forty-Nine humans are tied down, struggling to escape. These people will live, all forty-nine of them, unless you intervene.
